rows.label: qst201509_msg0035
rows.name: It was 16 knocks, right?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0036
rows.name:
I was supposed to be watching
carefully, but I didn't notice...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0037
rows.name:
Don't worry about it. It's
impossible for even the most
skilled Blade to pay attention 24/7.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0038
rows.name: ...Thank you.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0039
rows.name: Alright, I'll knock.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0040
rows.name:
*knock knock knock knock knock
knock knock knock knock knock knock
knock knock knock knock knock*

rows.label: qst201509_msg0041
rows.name: Phew... My arm is tired...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0001
rows.name: You must be Lapacoll.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0002
rows.name:
Indeed, I am Lapacoll...
but who are you?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0003
rows.name:
The Thanazalea you're gathering...
We'd like you to tell us what
you're using it for.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0004
rows.name:
Thanazalea?! I-I don't know
anything about that...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0005
rows.name: Oh, is that so?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0010
rows.name:
You're gathering Thanazalea
to make poison, aren't you?
A very potent one...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0011
rows.name: Why... do you know that...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0012
rows.name: There is nothing I cannot see.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0042
rows.name:
Are you aware that the ship
carrying what you made has sunk?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0043
rows.name:
And do you know that the
two who were gathering herbs
have been dealt with?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0044
rows.name:
You have no allies
left... How lonely...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0013
rows.name:
I'll say this for your own good.
Give up and tell me your purpose.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0014
rows.name: W-Who would tell you...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0015
rows.name:
Futile resistance is not
in your best interest.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0016
rows.name:
Tricks are useless before my
Clairvoyant Eye. I'll stop you
before you can even try anything.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0017
rows.name: Gck...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0018
rows.name:
Now, give up and tell me
everything, will you?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0019
rows.name: ...It was a request. From a Gulan man.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0020
rows.name:
The poison I made... Thanatitan...
is carried by ship abroad and
delivered to the client.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0021
rows.name:
It was supposed to be
done in two shipments.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0034
rows.name:
But last time, the arranged
ship sank with the cargo.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0022
rows.name: That must be the ship Azami sank...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0023
rows.name:
So... I was making more
Thanatitan, but...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0024
rows.name: ...you all came barging in.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0025
rows.name:
What do you plan to do with
such a large amount of poison?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0026
rows.name:
Thanatitan has the effect of
paralyzing a Divine Beast's
nerves and weakening it.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0027
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst201509_msg0028
rows.name:
The client's aim is to deliver
Thanatitan directly into the
Divine Beast's body and weaken it.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0045
rows.name:
So the first shipment of Thanatitan
is still usable, right?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0046
rows.name:
Yes... It arrived safely
at the client's location.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0029
rows.name: Where was it delivered?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0030
rows.name: I do not know...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0031
rows.name:
My job is only to load the
poison onto the ship. I do
not know its destination.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0033
rows.name:
...This is bad. Without any leads,
we have no way of finding it...
